name: Just Shoot Them
description:
Just shoot them is a littel game I've been working on for 1 week.

In the game you just shoot capsules and try to survive.

The Weg build takes some time to load and has a dumb Audio bug (that can be fixed if you just use the sliders in the options menu).

And now have fun :) !

ControlsKeys -Movew a s d / up arrow, down arrown, left, arrow, right arrow-Shootmouse 1-Special1, 2, 3-Pauseesc
